About

Cybersecurity & software engineering enthusiast. I enjoy exploring network captures, automating small tools, and learning secure system design. I’m currently building projects that demonstrate practical skills in packet analysis, automation, and cloud debugging.

Experience

Technical Support Engineer — Zscaler

Mar 2025 — Present · Wrocław (Hybrid)

  • Level 2 support for Zscaler ZIA/ZCC/ZDX products; troubleshoot customer network flows and proxy issues.
  • Analyze packet captures and logs (Wireshark, proxy logs) to identify routing, policy, and TLS issues.
  • Collaborate with engineering teams and document solutions for the internal knowledge base.
  • Provide timely technical responses and guidance to customers and internal stakeholders.

Specialist — Security / IT — LG Energy Solution

Sep 2024 — Mar 2025 · Wrocław (On-site)

  • Managed ID card issuance and modifications and configured access control zones and permissions.
  • Operated and troubleshooted physical security systems (ID readers, access control hardware) and related network components.
  • Maintained the Photo Permission system and assisted with physical penetration testing activities.
  • Supported overall security infrastructure to ensure reliable operation of site access systems.

Intern — IT Support — NEONET S.A.

Apr 2024 — Jun 2024 · Wrocław (On-site)

  • Handled support tickets and customer inquiries via the ticketing system.
  • Configured and deployed workstations, including hardware, OS, and software setup.
  • Diagnosed and resolved common hardware, software, and local network issues.
